title: Keep Your Forked Tongue (4U96)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Skirmish: Spot Gandalf and 3 twilight tokens to prevent all wounds to a companion who has the Gandalf signet.
Lore:	”'A witless worm you have become.'”
Rarity:	U
